import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Staker Delegations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/staker/delegations"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves phase-1 delegations for a given staker. This endpoint will be deprecated once all phase-1 delegations are either withdrawn or registered into phase-2.
This endpoint is only used to show legacy phase-1 delegations for the purpose of unbonding or registering into phase-2.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Staker BTC Public Key","in":"query","name":"staker_btc_pk","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Only return delegations with pending actions which include active, unbonding, unbonding_requested, unbonded","in":"query","name":"pending_action","schema":{"type":"boolean"}},{"description":"Pagination key to fetch the next page of delegations","in":"query","name":"pagination_key","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"data":{"items":{"properties":{"finality_provider_pk_hex":{"type":"string"},"is_eligible_for_transition":{"type":"boolean"},"is_overflow":{"type":"boolean"},"is_slashed":{"type":"boolean"},"staker_pk_hex":{"type":"string"},"staking_tx":{"properties":{"output_index":{"type":"integer"},"start_height":{"type":"integer"},"start_timestamp":{"type":"string"},"timelock":{"type":"integer"},"tx_hex":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"v1service.TransactionPublic"},"staking_tx_hash_hex":{"type":"string"},"staking_value":{"type":"integer"},"state":{"type":"string"},"unbonding_tx":{"properties":{"output_index":{"type":"integer"},"start_height":{"type":"integer"},"start_timestamp":{"type":"string"},"timelock":{"type":"integer"},"tx_hex":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"v1service.TransactionPublic"}},"type":"object","title":"v1service.DelegationPublic"},"type":"array"},"pagination":{"properties":{"next_key":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"handler.paginationResponse"}},"type":"object","title":"handler.PublicResponse-array_v1service_DelegationPublic"}}},"description":"List of delegations and pagination token"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"err":{},"errorCode":{"enum":["INTERNAL_SERVICE_ERROR","VALIDATION_ERROR","NOT_FOUND","BAD_REQUEST","FORBIDDEN","UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY","REQUEST_TIMEOUT"],"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["InternalServiceError","ValidationError","NotFound","BadRequest","Forbidden","UnprocessableEntity","RequestTimeout"],"title":"types.ErrorCode"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"type":"object","title":"github_com_babylonlabs-io_staking-api-service_internal_shared_types.Error"}}},"description":"Error: Bad Request"}}}
